article.title: Student view
article.para: The student view will expand the basic elements by following student functions.

section.title: Dashboard
section.para: On the one hand you can see on this site all available courses, on the other hand you can see your courses additively.

section.title: Course
section.para: For every course you can see its survey. Moreover, if you have subscribed this, you can unsubscribe by clicking the "leave this course" button. If you haven't subscribed to a course, you can do so by clicking the button "join this course".
For every lesson of this course start and finish lessons of this course. At this, you can have only one lesson in process at any given time. Besides you can only work on a lesson one after another.
